name: Sassenpoort
title: Sassenpoort
description: A medieval city gate in Zwolle, Netherlands, and one of the best-preserved in the country. It dates back to the late 14th century.

name: De Peperbus Tower
title: De Peperbus Tower
description: A landmark church tower in Zwolle, part of the Basilica of Our Lady. It is one of the tallest towers in the Netherlands.

name: Museum de Fundatie
title: Museum de Fundatie
description: An art museum in Zwolle, known for its extensive collection of fine arts and its unique dome-shaped architecture.

name: St. Michael’s Church (Grote Kerk)
title: St. Michael’s Church (Grote Kerk)
description: A historic Protestant church in Zwolle, dating back to the 15th century, known for its impressive organ and Gothic architecture.

name: Synagoge
title: Synagoge
description: The synagogue of Zwolle, a historic Jewish place of worship that represents the city's rich cultural heritage.
